name: Private Equity Exit Timing Optimization
description: Optimize exit timing for PE portfolio companies by analyzing market conditions, company performance, and economic indicators to determine the optimal exit window that maximizes after-tax returns.

objectives: Maximize after-tax exit value considering timing, market conditions, and holding costs

constraints: Company EBITDA growth rate must meet minimum threshold
Exit must occur before fund end date minus 12 months
Market conditions must be favorable (valuation multiples, IPO window)
Sufficient buyer appetite (strategic and financial buyers)
Management team must be stable (no key departures expected)
Hold period must qualify for long-term capital gains if possible

external_apis.purpose: Get valuation multiples (EV/EBITDA, P/E) for comparable public companies
GDP growth, interest rates, inflation for valuation modeling
Sector-specific market conditions and M&A activity

parsing_config.prompt_template:
You are a private equity exit planning specialist. Extract:

1. Portfolio Company Details:
   - Company name
   - Industry sector
   - Current EBITDA ($M)
   - EBITDA growth rate (%)
   - Revenue ($M)

2. Deal Information:
   - Acquisition date (MM/YYYY)
   - Purchase price ($M)
   - Entry multiple (EV/EBITDA)
   - Current ownership %

3. Fund Context:
   - Fund vintage year
   - Fund end date
   - Target IRR (%)

4. Market Context:
   - Industry M&A activity (hot/moderate/cold)
   - Potential buyers mentioned

Return JSON with all details.

domain_expert.title: Private Equity Principal
domain_expert.profile: Expert in portfolio company value creation, market timing, exit strategy execution, and GP-LP dynamics with 12+ years at top-tier PE firms
priorities: Tax optimization (long-term vs short-term capital gains)
Market timing and sector sentiment analysis
Fund lifecycle management and LP expectations

math_expert.title: Time-Series Optimization Specialist
math_expert.profile: Expert in dynamic programming, scenario analysis, and temporal decision-making under uncertainty
math_expert.formulation: Dynamic optimization maximizing after-tax exit proceeds across time periods with market condition modeling
math_expert.problem_class: Stochastic Dynamic Programming with Time-Dependent Constraints
math_expert.solution_method: Monte Carlo scenario evaluation with market condition weighting
